body_html:
There's active work in contrib.seq2seq. we're not sure yet if the final API will be functional or object oriented. Will know more in about a week.
…

body:
There's active work in contrib.seq2seq.  we're not sure yet if the final
API will be functional or object oriented.  Will know more in about a week.
